Message.Text: Frank, I can't believe my students are sharing code on Snapchat! What’s wrong with them?
Actually, Tommy, they’re using Discord for that.
Discord? No way! I swear they’re on Snapchat! This is so frustrating!
I promise, it’s Discord. They have channels specifically for coding discussions.
How can they take coding seriously on Snapchat? It’s just a messaging app!
But they’re not using Snapchat; they’re collaborating on Discord.
I don’t understand why they would even think Snapchat is a good idea for this!
It’s really Discord, Tommy. They can focus and share code properly there.
This is just so annoying! If they’re really on Discord, why is there so much talk about Snapchat?
